description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". A number of German scenes and activities are shown. The fossil museum, a wholesale market, the German Antarctic Research station and a world record sportsman are featured. Also shows reclamation of land of the northern region coastal mud-flats and dykes; new school in Munich teaching genuine Bavarian music.
